error.msg: The struct 'ALLEGRO_BITMAP' forward declaration is unnecessary. Type struct is already declared earlier.
The struct 'ALLEGRO_DISPLAY' forward declaration is unnecessary. Type struct is already declared earlier.

C-style pointer casting detected. C++ offers four different kinds of casts as replacements: static_cast, const_cast, dynamic_cast and reinterpret_cast. A C-style cast could evaluate to any of those automatically, thus it is considered safer if the programmer explicitly states which kind of cast is expected. See also: https://www.securecoding.cert.org/confluence/display/cplusplus/EXP05-CPP.+Do+not+use+C-style+casts.
Variable 'DependedFalse' is assigned a value that is never used.
Variable 'DependedFalse' is assigned a value that is never used.
Unused private function: 'JoystickState::_deleteState'
The iterator 'it' is invalid before being assigned. Dereferencing or comparing it with another iterator is invalid operation.
The iterator 'it' is invalid before being assigned. Dereferencing or comparing it with another iterator is invalid operation.

When an object of a class is created, the constructors of all member variables are called consecutively in the order the variables are declared, even if you don't explicitly write them to the initialization list. Cppcheck cannot find all the include files. Cppcheck can check the code without the include files found. But the results will probably be more accurate if all the include files are found. Please check your project's include directories and add all of them as include directories for Cppcheck. To see what files Cppcheck cannot find use --check-config.
